devdoc.author: Stefan George - <stefan@gnosis.pm>

changeDailyLimit(address,uint256).details: Allows to update the daily limit for a specified token. This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

params.dailyLimit: Daily limit in smallest token unit.

changeMasterCopy(address).details: Allows to upgrade the contract. This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

executeDailyLimit(address,address,uint25.details: Returns if Safe transaction is a valid daily limit transaction.

params.amount: Amount of tokens (or Ether) that should be transfered
params.to: Address to which the tokens should be transfered
params.token: Address of the token that should be transfered (0 for Ether)

executeDailyLimit(address,address,uint25.return: Returns if transaction can be executed.

setup(address[],uint256[]).details: Setup function sets initial storage of contract.

params._dailyLimits: List of daily limits in smalles units (e.g. Wei for Ether).
params.tokens: List of token addresses. Ether is represented with address 0x0.

today().details: Returns last midnight as Unix timestamp.

devdoc.title: Daily Limit Module - Allows to transfer limited amounts of ERC20 tokens and Ether without confirmations.
